name: WIP (CARD GAME)
description:
This is a prototype of an idea I had a few months ago, a roguelike with stories, battles, and CARDS! Nyeh! (Made with GameMaker Studio:2.3)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

The source code can be bought from here or from the GMS marketplace right here:

https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/10824/cardgame-sourcecode

PLEASE TRY THE GAME BEFORE BUYING THE SOURCECODE (MAKE SURE IT'S WHAT YOU NEED)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

I've been working on this thing for over two months now, and decided to release a small fight to see whether the idea can actually stick. Currently the game has the following:

_5 Cards to pick from for your deck.

_A slime fight (he can slam you around or just put you to bed, it's a gamble.)

_A basic system for character customization with 5 Hair styles, 5 eyes and glasses, and five mouths, that you can mix to you're heart's content.

_3 Stats to affect your deck, and thus, your chances of winning. (I forgot to use "Speed" in anything, so technically it's only two stats)

_and... well that's kinda it so far.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

If you have fun with it please consider leaving a rating, or maybe donating, if you feel like it... no pressure really.... I don't care... (This is how you play hard to get... right...?)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Seriously though, thanks for playing. Let me know if I can improve or add something.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
